response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge as per the execution plan. There were no errors during execution. The next step is to take the bacon out of the fridge.

response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take the bacon out of the fridge
    bacon = registry(env,"bacon_150")
    EasyGrasp(robot, bacon)
    donothing(env)
